home.title: Welcome to Our Rice Mill.
home.description: We produce the finest quality rice in Nepal.

about.title: About Us
about.description: New Puja Khadya Udhyog has been a trusted rice mill for over 25 years, blending tradition with innovation to deliver premium rice products to our community. We take pride in our sustainable farming and modern milling processes.

products.title: Our Products
products.description: Explore our range of high-quality rice products, including various types of rice, rice bran, husk, and residual rice.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Explore images of our rice mill, products, and daily operations.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Feel free to reach out to us through phone, email, or visit our mill location.
